sentences.en: a blue and white striped jacket
a blue and white striped shirt
A tiger has a striped coat.
He was faultlessly attired in black coat and striped trousers.
sentences.cn: 他穿着黑色上衣和条纹裤子，简直无可挑剔。
他穿着带条纹的睡衣裤.

sentences.en: His striped tie showed up well against his dark red shirt.
sentences.cn: 他那条纹领带在深红色的衬衫下十分醒目.

sentences.en: His striped tie was loosened at his throat.
sentences.cn: 他的条纹领带松松地挂在脖子上。

sentences.en: I identify them by their red and white striped collar mark.
sentences.cn: 这是我从他们领章上的红白条纹看出来的.

sentences.en: Jack's plaid shirt didn't mix well with his striped trousers.
sentences.cn: 杰克的方格衬衫与条纹长裤不相配.

sentences.en: She sat under a striped umbrella.
Striped awnings had been stretched across the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 一些条纹雨篷撑开架在院子上方.

sentences.en: The stick of candy was striped with red.
sentences.cn: 这根棒糖上有红色条纹.

sentences.en: The striped band round a policeman's sleeve is to signify that he is on duty.
sentences.cn: 警察袖子上的袖标标明他正在执勤.

sentences.en: There is a striped sofa along the wall.
sentences.cn: 有一张靠墙放着的有条纹的沙发.

sentences.en: They had the hall done out in striped wallpaper.
sentences.cn: 他们在大厅贴了有条纹的墙纸.

sentences.en: Young men paraded up and down the street in striped blazers.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们穿着鲜艳的条纹运动衫在街上招摇地走来走去.

words.tran_cn: 拆开；去膜；加条纹；条纹图案
脱衣舞女；剥离器；脱模机
剥夺（strip的过去分词形式）；脱衣；把…剪成条状

trans.tran_cn: 有条纹的，有斑纹的，喝醉了的
trans.tran_en: having lines or bands of colour
